main event: On the evening of October 6, 1957, five observers reported sighting an unidentified flying object near Alamogordo, New Mexico.
interesting points: Two Air Force personnel were among the witnesses., The object was circular, luminous, and estimated to be about 50-75 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 minutes before the object disappeared., No sound was reported during the sighting., The Air Force is investigating this incident.
witness description: includes two Air Force personnel and other observers
